00303             function                pre_generation( $Options )
00304             {
00305                   try
00306                   {
00307                         $PackagePath = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 'page::page_composer' , '1.0.0' );
00308                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->add_stylesheet( "{http_host}/$PackagePath/res/css/core.css" );
00309                         
00310                         $Lang = get_package( 'lang' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00311                         $Lang->include_strings_js( 'page::page_composer' );
00312                         
00313                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'page_permit_validation' , false ) )
00314                         {
00315                               $Permits = get_package( 'permit::permit_algorithms' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00316                               $PageName = $this->Security->get_g( 'page_name' , 'command' );
00317                               
00318                               if( $Permits->validate_permits_ex( false , 'user' , $PageName , 'page' ) === false )
00319                               {
00320                                     header( 'Location: ./no_permits.html' );
00321                                     exit( 1 );
00322                               }
00323                         }
00324                   }
00325                   catch( Exception $e )
00326                   {
00327                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00328                   }
00329             }

00411             function                process_success_message()
00412             {
00413                   try
00414                   {
00415                         if( $this->Security->get_s( 'success_message' , 'set' ) )
00416                         {
00417                               $this->add_success_message( $this->Security->get_s( 'success_message' , 'command' ) );
00418                               $this->Security->unset_s( 'success_message' );
00419                         }
00420                         
00421                         $PageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' );
00422                         
00423                         if( $this->Security->get_s( "$PageName:success_message" , 'set' ) )
00424                         {
00425                               $this->add_success_message( $this->Security->get_s( "$PageName:success_message" , 'command' ) );
00426                               $this->Security->unset_s( "$PageName:success_message" );
00427                         }
00428                   }
00429                   catch( Exception $e )
00430                   {
00431                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00432                   }
00433             }

00457             function                prepare_page_generation( $PageName )
00458             {
00459                   try
00460                   {
00461                         if( GZIP_TRAFFIC )
00462                         {
00463                               @ob_start( 'ob_gzhandler' , 9 );
00464                         }
00465 
00466                         $this->process_success_message();
00467                         
00468                         $PageDescription = $this->PageAccess->get_page_description( $PageName );
00469                         
00470                         if( $PageDescription[ 'template' ] == 'default' )
00471                         {
00472                               $this->Template = $this->TemplateManager->get_default_template_name();
00473                         }
00474                         elseif( $PageDescription[ 'template' ] == 'default_admin' )
00475                         {
00476                               $this->Template = $this->TemplateManager->get_default_admin_template_name();
00477                         }
00478                         $PageDescription[ 'template' ] = $this->Template[ 'name' ];
00479                         $PageDescription[ 'template_version' ] = $this->Template[ 'version' ];
00480                         
00481                         return( $PageDescription );
00482                   }
00483                   catch( Exception $e )
00484                   {
00485                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00486                   }
00487             }

00515             function                fetch_page_data( &$Page , $PageName , $PageDescription )
00516             {
00517                   try
00518                   {
00519                         $this->TemplateName = $PageDescription[ 'template' ];
00520                         $this->TemplateVersion = $PageDescription[ 'template_version' ];
00521                         
00522                         $this->Template = $this->TemplateManager->get_template( 
00523                               $PageDescription[ 'template' ] , $PageDescription[ 'template_version' ]
00524                         );
00525 
00526                         $this->set_page_title( $PageDescription[ 'title' ] );
00527 
00528                         $this->Packages = $this->PageComposerUtilities->get_package_appliance( 
00529                               $Page , $PageName , $PageDescription[ 'options' ]
00530                         );
00531                         
00532                         $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00533                         $Settings->load_settings( $PageDescription[ 'options' ] );
00534                         $this->Layout = $Settings->get_setting( 'layout' , 'default' );
00535                         
00536                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->fetch_packages( $this->Packages , $this->Template );
00537                   }
00538                   catch( Exception $e )
00539                   {
00540                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00541                   }
00542             }

00596             function                output_trace_if_necessary()
00597             {
00598                   try
00599                   {
00600                         if( $this->Security->get_gp( 'trace' , 'integer' , 0 ) )
00601                         {
00602                               $String = $this->Template->get_template();
00603                               $String = str_replace( '{trace}' , $this->Trace->compile_trace() , $String );
00604                               $String = $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_processors( 
00605                                     $this->Packages , $String , 'post_process'
00606                               );
00607                               $this->Template->set_template( $String );
00608                         }
00609                         elseif( $this->Security->get_gp( 'trace_only' , 'integer' , 0 ) )
00610                         {
00611                               $String = $this->Trace->compile_trace();
00612                               $String = $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_processors(
00613                                     $this->Packages , $String , 'post_process'
00614                               );
00615                               print( $String );
00616                               exit( 0 );
00617                         }
00618                   }
00619                   catch( Exception $e )
00620                   {
00621                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00622                   }
00623             }

00651             function                generation_loop( &$Page , $PageName , $PageDescription )
00652             {
00653                   try
00654                   {
00655                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_generators( 
00656                               $this->Packages , 'pre_generation' , $this->Template
00657                         );
00658                               
00659                         $String = $this->Template->get_template();
00660 
00661                         $String = $this->execute_processors( $String , 'pre_process' );
00662                         $Settings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00663                         $Settings->load_settings( $PageDescription[ 'options' ] );
00664                         $String = $this->String->print_record( $String , $Settings->get_raw_settings() );
00665                         $this->Template->set_template( $String );
00666 
00667                         $this->Template->process( $PageName );
00668                         $this->process_direct_controllers();
00669                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->process_controllers( $this->Packages );
00670                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->process_views( $this->Packages , $this->Template );
00671 
00672                         $this->process_direct_views();
00673                         
00674                         $String = $this->Template->get_template();
00675                         $String = $this->execute_processors( $String , 'post_process' );
00676                         $this->Template->set_template( $String );
00677 
00678                         $this->PageComposerUtilities->execute_generators(
00679                               $this->Packages , 'post_generation' , $this->Template
00680                         );
00681                         
00682                         $this->output_trace_if_necessary();
00683                         
00684                         /* \~russian зачищаем шаблон от служебной разметки
00685                            \~english clean up template */
00686                         $this->Template->cleanup( $PageName , $PageDescription[ 'options' ] );
00687                   }
00688                   catch( Exception $e )
00689                   {
00690                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00691                   }
00692             }
00693       
00716             function                get_page( $PageName )
00717             {
00718                   try
00719                   {
00720                         $PageDescription = $this->prepare_page_generation( $PageName );
00721                         
00722                         if( $PageDescription !== false )
00723                         {
00724                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:page_generation_start} : $PageName" , COMMON );
00725                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:fetching_data} : $PageName" , COMMON );
00726                               $this->fetch_page_data( $this->PageAccess , $PageName , $PageDescription );
00727 
00728                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:run_generation_loop} : $PageName" , COMMON );
00729                               $this->generation_loop( $this->PageAccess , $PageName , $PageDescription );
00730 
00731                               return( $this->Template->get_template() );
00732                         }
00733                         else
00734                         {
00735                               $this->Trace->add_trace_string( "{lang:requested_page_was_not_found} : $PageName" , ERROR );
00736                               
00737                               return( $this->get_page( '404' ) );
00738                         }
00739                   }
00740                   catch( Exception $e )
00741                   {
00742                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00743                   }
00744             }

00765             {

00767                   {
00768                         if( $this->ErrorMessages === false || array_search( $Message , $this->ErrorMessages ) === false )
00769                         {
00770                               $this->ErrorMessages [] = $Message;
00771                         }
00772                   }
00773                   catch( Exception $e )
00774                   {
00775                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00776                   }
00777             }

00797             function                get_last_error_message()
00798             {
00799                   try
00800                   {
00801                         if( $this->ErrorMessages !== false && isset( $this->ErrorMessages[ 0 ] ) )
00802                         {
00803                               return( $this->ErrorMessages[ count( $this->ErrorMessages ) - 1 ] );
00804                         }
00805                         else
00806                         {
00807                               return( 'message_was_not_found' );
00808                         }
00809                   }
00810                   catch( Exception $e )
00811                   {
00812                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00813                   }

00943             function                pre_process( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
00944             {
00945                   try
00946                   {
00947                         $PageName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'command' );
00948                         
00949                         $ContentSpecification = $this->String->block_exists(
00950                               $Str , 'page:'.$PageName , 'page:~'.$PageName
00951                         );
00952                         
00953                         if( $ContentSpecification )
00954                         {
00955                               $Str = $this->String->show_block(
00956                                     $Str , 'page:'.$PageName , 'page:~'.$PageName , $Changed
00957                               );
00958                         }
00959                         else
00960                         {
00961                               $Str = $this->String->show_block(
00962                                     $Str , 'page:default' , 'page:~default' , $Changed
00963                               );
00964                         }
00965 
00966                         if( $this->String->block_exists( $Str , 'layout' ) )
00967                         {
00968                               $Str = str_replace( '{layout}' , '{include:'.$this->Layout.'}' , $Str );
00969                         }
00970                         
00971                         do
00972                         {
00973                               $PlaceHolders = array();
00974                               preg_match( '/\{page:([a-zA-Z0-9_]+)\}/' , $Str , $PlaceHolders );
00975                               
00976                               if( count( $PlaceHolders ) > 1 )
00977                               {
00978                                     $Str = $this->String->hide_block(
00979                                           $Str , 'page:'.$PlaceHolders[ 1 ] , 'page:~'.$PlaceHolders[ 1 ] , $Changed
00980                                     );
00981                               }
00982                         }
00983                         while( count( $PlaceHolders ) > 1 );
00984                         
00985                         return( $Str );
00986                   }
00987                   catch( Exception $e )
00988                   {
00989                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00990                   }
00991             }
00992             
01007             function                process_direct_controllers()
01008             {
01009                   try
01010                   {
01011                         $this->Trace->start_group( "direct_controllers" );
01012                         
01013                         $String = $this->Template->get_template();
01014                         
01015                         $Changed = false;
01016                         list( $String , $Changed ) = $this->PageMarkup->process_direct_controller( $String , $Changed );
01017                         
01018                         $this->Template->set_template( $String );
01019                         
01020                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01021                   }
01022                   catch( Exception $e )
01023                   {
01024                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01025                   }
01026             }

01042             function                process_direct_views()
01043             {
01044                   try
01045                   {
01046                         $this->Trace->start_group( "direct_views" );
01047                         
01048                         $this->Security->reset_s( 'direct_view' , true );
01049                         
01050                         $String = $this->Template->get_template();
01051 
01052                         $Changed = false;
01053                         list( $String , $Changed ) = $this->PageMarkup->process_direct_view( $String , $Changed );
01054                         
01055                         $this->Template->set_template( $String );
01056                         
01057                         $this->Security->reset_s( 'direct_view' , false );
01058                         
01059                         $this->Trace->end_group();
01060                   }
01061                   catch( Exception $e )
01062                   {
01063                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01064                   }
01065             }

01097             function                process_string( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
01098             {
01099                   try
01100                   {
01101                         if( strpos( $Str , '{page_name}' ) !== false )
01102                         {
01103                               $Str = str_replace( '{page_name}' , $this->Security->get_gp( 'page_name' , 'string' ) , $Str );
01104                         }
01105                         
01106                         for( ; $Parameters = $this->String->get_macro_parameters( $Str , 'meta' ) ; )
01107                         {
01108                               $this->BlockSettings->load_settings( $Parameters );
01109                               $this->BlockSettings->set_setting(
01110                                     'package_version' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
01111                               );
01112 
01113                               $MetaFile = _get_package_relative_path_ex( 
01114                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) , 
01115                                     $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' ) 
01116                               ).'/meta/'.$this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'name' );
01117 
01118                               $MetaSettings = get_package_object( 'settings::settings' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
01119 
01120                               $MetaSettings->load_file( $MetaFile );
01121                               
01122                               $MetaSettings->set_setting( 'package_name' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_name' ) );
01123                               $MetaSettings->set_setting( 
01124                                     'package_version' , $this->BlockSettings->get_setting( 'package_version' , 'last' )
01125                               );
01126                               
01127                               if( $MetaSettings->get_setting( 'controller' , '0' ) != '0' )
01128                               {
01129                                     $Str = str_replace(
01130                                           "{meta:$Parameters}" , '{direct_controller:'.$MetaSettings->get_all_settings().'}' , 
01131                                           $Str
01132                                     );
01133                               }
01134                               elseif( $MetaSettings->get_setting( 'view' , '0' ) != '0' )
01135                               {
01136                                     $Str = str_replace(
01137                                           "{meta:$Parameters}" , '{direct_view:'.$MetaSettings->get_all_settings().'}' , 
01138                                           $Str
01139                                     );
01140                               }
01141                               elseif( $MetaSettings->get_setting( 'post_process' , '0' ) != '0' )
01142                               {
01143                                     $Str = $this->execute_processors( $Str , 'post_process' );
01144                                     $Str = str_replace( "{meta:$Parameters}" , '' , $Str );
01145                               }
01146 
01147                               $Changed = true;
01148                         }
01149                         
01150                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->PageMarkup->process_direct_view( $Str , $Changed );
01151 
01152                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->PageMarkup->process_direct_controller( $Str , $Changed );
01153                         
01154                         return( $Str );
01155                   }
01156                   catch( Exception $e )
01157                   {
01158                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01159                   }
01160             }
01161             
01188             function                process_messages( $Str , $Changed )
01189             {
01190                   try
01191                   {
01192                         if( is_array( $this->ErrorMessages ) && count( $this->ErrorMessages ) )
01193                         {
01194                               $StartingDiv = '<table class="error message_corner_all"><tr><td>'.
01195                                                             '<div class="aligned_message_white">';
01196                               $ClosingDiv = '</div></td></tr></table><br>';
01197                               $Str = str_replace( 
01198                                     '{error_message}' , $StartingDiv.'{lang:'.implode( '}'.$ClosingDiv.
01199                                     $StartingDiv.'{lang:' , $this->ErrorMessages ).'}'.$ClosingDiv , $Str
01200                               );
01201                               $this->ErrorMessages = array();
01202                               $Changed = true;
01203                         }
01204                         
01205                         if( is_array( $this->SuccessMessages ) && count( $this->SuccessMessages ) )
01206                         {
01207                               $StartingDiv = '<table class="success message_corner_all"><tr><td>'.
01208                                                             '<div class="aligned_message_black">';
01209                               $ClosingDiv = '</div></td></tr></table><br>';
01210                               $Str = str_replace( 
01211                                     '{success_message}' , $StartingDiv.'{lang:'.implode( '}'.$ClosingDiv.
01212                                     $StartingDiv.'{lang:' , $this->SuccessMessages ).'}'.$ClosingDiv , $Str
01213                               );
01214                               $this->SuccessMessages = array();
01215                               $Changed = true;
01216                         }
01217                         
01218                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
01219                   }
01220                   catch( Exception $e )
01221                   {
01222                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01223                   }
01224             }
01225             
01252             function                set_page_info( $Str , $Changed )
01253             {
01254                   try
01255                   {
01256                         if( strpos( $Str , '{title}' ) )
01257                         {
01258                               $Str = str_replace( '{title}' , $this->PageTitle , $Str );
01259                               $Changed = true;
01260                         }
01261                         
01262                         if( strpos( $Str , '{keywords}' ) )
01263                         {
01264                               $Str = str_replace( '{keywords}' , $this->PageKeywords , $Str );
01265                               $Changed = true;
01266                         }
01267                         
01268                         if( strpos( $Str , '{description}' ) )
01269                         {
01270                               $Str = str_replace( 
01271                                     '{description}' , $this->PageDescription , $Str 
01272                               );
01273                               $Changed = true;
01274                         }
01275                         
01276                         return( array( $Str , $Changed ) );
01277                   }
01278                   catch( Exception $e )
01279                   {
01280                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01281                   }
01282             }
01283             
01314             function                post_process( $Options , $Str , &$Changed )
01315             {
01316                   try
01317                   {
01318                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->process_messages( $Str , $Changed );
01319                         
01320                         list( $Str , $Changed ) = $this->set_page_info( $Str , $Changed );
01321                         
01322                         $this->process_direct_views();
01323                         
01324                         return( $this->process_string( $Options , $Str , $Changed ) );
01325                   }
01326                   catch( Exception $e )
01327                   {
01328                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01329                   }
01330             }
01331             
01354             function                view( $Options )
01355             {
01356                   try
01357                   {
01358                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'direct_view' , false ) )
01359                         {
01360                               $Options->load_from_http();
01361                               
01362                               return( $this->PageMarkup->direct_view( $Options ) );
01363                         }
01364                         if( $Options->get_setting( 'direct_controller' , false ) )
01365                         {
01366                               $Options->load_from_http();
01367                               
01368                               $this->PageMarkup->direct_controller( $Options );
01369                               
01370                               return;
01371                         }
01372                   }
01373                   catch( Exception $e )
01374                   {
01375                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
01376                   }
01377             }
01378       }
